import React from 'react' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Product = ({product}) => { const addToCart = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return ( <>
{product.name} Price: {product.price} Rating: {product.rating} | {product.numReviews} user ratings ) } export default Product
